Greece here. The protesters have ruined tourism on several islands, causing huge problems for local homeowners and watts stress on an already hard financial state of affairs (thanks Merkel). Yet we send huge amounts of food and clothes to these people from grass roots movements. What do we get? Riots.... Everywhere there are riots. These people have made us live in a violent environment now. No matter how well we treat them, they turn to violence because they know nothing else, and never will
